Property Documentation

- (NSString *) autoScalingGroupName [read, write, retain]

The name of the Auto Scaling group.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 1600
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSDate *) endTime [read, write, retain]

The latest scheduled start time to return.

If scheduled action names are provided, this field will be ignored.

- (NSNumber *) maxRecords [read, write, retain]

The maximum number of scheduled actions to return.

Constraints:
Range: 1 - 50

- (NSString *) nextToken [read, write, retain]

A string that marks the start of the next batch of returned results.

Constraints:
Pattern: [---
]*

- (NSMutableArray *) scheduledActionNames [read, write, retain]

A list of scheduled actions to be described.

If this list is omitted, all scheduled actions are described. The list of requested scheduled actions cannot contain more than 50 items. If an auto scaling group name is provided, the results are limited to that group. If unknown scheduled actions are requested, they are ignored with no error.

- (NSDate *) startTime [read, write, retain]

The earliest scheduled start time to return.

If scheduled action names are provided, this field will be ignored.
